resources.string: Tap row(s) to select for deletion
You must enter a name for your workout
No changes were made, rename was the same as original
You must enter a name for your exercise
Add Exercise Or Set Dialog Tag
Select a position for the Workout:
An error occurred while trying to reposition workout. Please try again.
An error occurred while trying to delete the workout(s). Please try again.
There are no workouts to delete
There are no sets to delete
There are no exercises to delete
Information Dialog Tag Choose Workout Date
- Workouts can be deleted via a left or right swipe.
- Workouts can be rearranged by long pressing the dark gray area on the far left of the row and dragging the workout either up or down.
- Clicking on a Workout will bring you to its Exercise list.
- Long clicking on a Workout will allow you to rename it.
- Leaving this screen will automatically save your changes.
- Exercises can be deleted via a left or right swipe.
- Exercises can be rearranged by long pressing the dark gray area on the far left of the row and dragging the workout either up or down.
- Clicking on an Exercise will bring you to its Set list.
- Long clicking on an Exercise will allow you to rename it.
- Sets can be deleted via a left or right swipe.
- Sets can be rearranged by long pressing the dark gray area on the far left of the row and dragging the workout either up or down.
- Clicking on a Set will allow you to edit its properties.
You must select at least one date to assign to your workout(s)
You must select at least one Workout
Delete Workouts From View Dialog Tag
Please select at least one Workout to delete or press \'Cancel\'
This is today\'s date. If there are workout(s) scheduled, you can view this workout(s) in either of two ways...
- Select the \"View\" option to view this workout(s) in a recap fashion. You can delete the workout(s) but otherwise, they aren\'t editable.
- Select the \"Today\" option to view this workout(s) in a modifiable, on-the-go state.
Select View Or Today Dialog Tag
You currently have no Workouts to assign. Would you like to go create one/some?
Jump To Create Edit Dialog Tag
Confirm Delete Today Workout Dialog Tag
An error occurred. Please try again.
An error occurred. Please try again.
An error occurred while you were trying to view your workout(s). Please try again.
An error occurred in displaying your Workout list. Please try again.
An error occurred in modifying your Workout list. Please try again.
An error occurred in modifying your Exercise list. Please try again.
An error occurred in modifying your Set list. Please try again.
An error occurred in displaying your Exercise list. Please try again.
An error occurred in displaying your Set list. Please try again.
An error occurred in adding your workout to the Workout list. Please try again.
An error occurred in adding your exercise to the Exercise list. Please try again.
An error occurred in adding your set to the Set list. Please try again.
An error occurred in adding to Today\'s Workout. Please try again.
Workout not added. Please add only uniquely named workouts to the Workout list.
Exercise not added. Please add only uniquely named exercises to the Exercise list.
An error occurred in repositioning your workout to the Workout list. Please try again.
An error occurred in updating your workout(s) in the Workout list. Please try again.
An error occurred in deleting your workout(s) from the Workout list. Please try again.
An error occurred in deleting your exercise(s) from the Exercise list. Please try again.
An error occurred in deleting your set(s) from the Set list. Please try again.
An error occurred in assigning date/dates to your workout(s). Please try again.
An error occurred in loading workout data. Please try again.
You have no workouts scheduled for today.
An error occurred in searching for today\'s workout(s). Please try again.
Your Workout list is empty. Click the \'+\' sign to add a Workout.
Your Workout list is empty. Please create one to continue.
No workouts were scheduled for this date.
- View this date\'s workout(s). The workout(s) can be deleted but otherwise can\'t be edited here.
- View today\'s workout(s) and update your progress as you workout.
- Choose from one of the workout\'s scheduled for today to view and update your progress on the workout.
- You can swipe left or right to see different workouts (if there are multiple workouts set to this date there will be page indicators on display near the bottom of the screen).
- Completed workouts, exercises and sets will be denoted via strikethrough text.
- Exercises and Sets can be deleted via a left or right swipe.
- Exercises and Sets can be rearranged by long pressing the dark gray area on the far left of the row and dragging the row either up or down.
- Click on the white space of the row to trigger its expansion/collapse. [ + ] denotes an exercise row can be expanded to show its sets. [ - ] denotes it can be collapsed to hide its sets.
- Checking the checkbox signifies that you have completed that workout set denoted via strikethrough text.
- Clicking the pencil box graphic in an exercise row will allow you to rename it.
- Select a date to view that day\'s workout(s).
- Select date(s) to assign to your Workout(s).
- Today\'s date is highlighted in gray but it IS NOT selected by default.
- You can select multiple dates to assign to your workout(s) by clicking multiple calendar positions.
- Assigning a workout to a date or dates that already contains a workout with the same name will overwrite that workout.
Click the + button to add a Workout
Click the + button to add an Exercise
Click the + button to add an Exercise and Set(s)
Click the + button to add a Set
- Click the \"Today\" option to bring up any workouts you may have scheduled for today. You will be able to edit them on the go.

- Click the \"View\" option to bring up any workouts you may have scheduled for a date. You can delete these workouts but they will not be editable otherwise unless you have chosen today\'s date in which you may opt to modify the workout(s).
- Click the \"Create/Edit\" option to create workouts.
- Click the \"Assign\" option to assign workouts you created inside the app to specific dates.
